Articles.Content:
Hello everyone.

Greetings and salutations to all!

I'n a brand new Kebenaut - joined the game on 0.20.2, two days before the .21 update (Literally - I had less then an hour in 0.20.2).

I'm a long time space-ish games fan, but this is the first sciency-space-ish game I had - and it's AWOSOME!!!

I first found the game after stumbling across one of Kurtjmac's excellent KSP youtube video's (he's commentary is absolutely hilarious, and really fun), learned the basic craft from the great Scott (Ker-)Manly, and have actually logged my 100th game hour last night, during the early stages of my new Minmus base "planet-fall" operation ().

Hope to see you around the orbit's corner...

Picabu
